pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Fourze (2011, TV show)$(br2)Used to craft Fourze's $(l:fourze/devices/fourze_driver)Fourze Driver$(/l)$(br2)Used to access Fourze's $(l:fourze/riders/fourze#rocket)Rocket Module$(/l)$(br2)Used to access Nadeshiko's $(l:fourze/riders/nadeshiko#rocket)Rocket Module$(/l)
